attributes.action: Keep Sports/leisure centres open during periods of lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Peoples mental and physical health will deteriorate significantly when prevented from accessing sports facilities offered at Sporst/Leisure Centers.
attributes.background: Consider the health impact of engagement in sports occupations offered by Sports/Leisure Centers on the health and well-being of the population and the related negative impact of reduced physical activity through closing facilities during lockdown.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
